channel.title: F.e.a.r
channel.description:
www.joinfear.com
Sorry about a massive download, there is also a patch you need to download.
VERY AWESOUME GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!
**NOTE**
This is only a multiplayer game of the version, if you have a shitty graphics card or computer download is not advised, as this game needs good computer specifications. The single player version of this game is also to if you want to download if off torrents, but the multiplayer version is free! Lots of servers also set up.
Screenshots:
[IMG]http://pcmedia.gamespy.com/pc/image/article/708/708927/fear-extraction-point-20060516020507994.jpg[/img]'
[IMG]http://www.dailygame.net/Articles/media/screens/FEAR/FEAR_1.jpg[/img]

item.title: F.e.a.r
item.dc:creator: @crashnburn crashnburn
item.description:
@crashnburn wrote:

I own the game there is both multiplayer and single player. I was impressed with the game at first but after beating it in a little over a day on the hardest difficulty level i’m going to have to say i’m no impressed. What happened to the day when games used to be hard?

Read full topic
